divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were out at the lake doing some night fishing sitting there, looking off into the sky, not a word was said, I had seen these two lights move up from the tree tops into the sky and they sat there looking like stars, thinking Oh maybe start or a satellite or something, but they didn't move at all then at once the just drop from the sky like nothing I have ever seen in my life, I then turned to my son and asked in a calm clear voice umm did you see that, his reply was the two lights that were in the sky and dropped down or shot way real fast as to leave 2 light trials I said yes ~ what was that? he said I have no clue it must be the Aliens again. we LOL, but now I just can't understand what it was or might have been.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fox Lake
There were no other sightings in Fox Lake on or around May 30th 2013
Summary: 2 light were north of us for a time looking like a stars then in undera sec, then shot straight down and were gone!
